title: SINN Manager LF Team
body:
Hi there, 

is your team participating in the SINN league and you need someone to manage your scrims, matchdays etc? I have over 2 years of experience managing different leagues and teams and currently a lot of freetime at my hands.
English/German possible.

If you are interested hit me up ingame or send a mail to lolcoaches@gmail.com.

{{champion:26}}
